name: Ozgener (Oz Family Cigars) - Pi Synesthesia - Toro
additionalNotes:
When General Cigar absorbed CAO in 2010, Tim Ozgener stepped away from the cigar business. Now, more than a decade later, the former head of CAO is launching a new company. Ozgener Family Cigars recently debuted its first line of cigars at the PCA 2022 Convention & Trade Show. Bosphorus is the first 
To start, a gorgeous Ecuadorian Sumatra wrapper holds an enchanting blend of tobaccos. With two binder leaves, one Ecuadoran Connecticut and the other Nicaraguan Jalapa, and a hearty mix of Nicaraguan fillers from three different regions (Esteli, Jalapa, and Ometepe), this cigar is a full-bodied masterpiece. Notes of earth, floral, wood, and pepper with invade your senses and excite your palate from start to finish.
